replies.bodyText: The class was already package-private so I didn't see a reason to keep the constructor public.  Is this a style for the project?
replies.author: sagnam

replies.bodyText:
Style in a legacy project like this is a strong word. Generally speaking "when in Rome," is best, but we are not opposed to meaningful improvements in style if coupled with meaningful work.
In this very specific case I'd say we prefer explicit access modifiers on all members.
